Local Time is: 03/23/2020 10:33:55.874   Nanoseconds: 873843000
GMT Time is: 03/23/2020 14:33:55.874   Microseconds: 873843

----- Testing DateTime's GMT vs Local time

GMT now time: 03/23/2020 14:33:55.876   1584974035
GMT ALT Constructor time: 03/23/2020 14:33:55.000   1584974035

Local now time: 03/23/2020 10:33:55.876   1584974035
Local ALT Constructor time: 03/23/2020 10:33:55.000   1584974035

GMT 1970 ALT Constructor time: 01/01/1970 00:00:00.000   0

Local 1989 ALT Constructor time: 12/14/1989 20:15:23.000   629687723
GMT 1989 ALT Constructor time: 12/14/1989 20:15:23.000   629669723


----- Testing DateTime's weekdays day methods

20020101 is a US holiday: YES
20011122 (Thanksgiving) is a US holiday: YES
12/25/1997 00:00:00.000 may not be a holiday
01/01/1999 00:00:00.000 may not be a holiday
12/25/1998 00:00:00.000 may not be a holiday

12/31/2004 00:00:00.000 may not be a holiday
12/24/2004 00:00:00.000 may not be a holiday

12/26/2005 00:00:00.000 may not be a holiday
01/01/2007 00:00:00.000 may not be a holiday
01/02/2007 00:00:00.000 may not be a holiday
12/25/2006 00:00:00.000 may not be a holiday
01/01/2008 00:00:00.000 may not be a holiday

----- Testing DateTime's diff methods

dt1 is: 01/01/2002 12:54:31.000
dt2 is: 02/01/2002 03:50:30.000
second difference between dt1 and dt2: -2.64576e+06
minute difference between dt1 and dt2: -44096
hour difference between dt1 and dt2: -734.933
day difference between dt1 and dt2: -30.6222
business day difference between dt1 and dt2: -22.6222
week difference between dt1 and dt2: -4.3746
After adding 10000 weekdays days to 19700101, the date is 04/30/2008 00:00:00.000

----- Testing DateTime's DST vs EST (Going Forward)

	Going from EST to DST

03/31/2006 00:00:00.000 --- 1143781200
04/01/2006 00:00:00.000 --- 1143867600
04/02/2006 00:00:00.000 --- 1143954000
04/03/2006 00:00:00.000 --- 1144036800
